posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

10/24/22 - 10/30/22
Issue - V123
Current Release: 1.14.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps
  • = components

Updates

  • Join Streamlit at BUILD 2022 and hear from @adrien_treuille @thiago @tyler @charly_wargnier @dataprofessor and more!
  • New connection tutorial: Connect Streamlit to TiDB.
  • After prototyping your apps in Figma you can turn your designs into code with the Figma-to-Streamlit plugin!
  • Learn how to make a video content analyzer app with Streamlit and AssemblyAI. @misraturp

Featured Content

  • Toggle Switch Component @CarlosSerrano
  • Heart-shaped toggle switch component @ShruAgarwal
  • Open-Vocabulary Object Detection with OWL-ViT

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Real-time browser-ready computer vision apps with Streamlit - presented by Yuichiro Tachibana @whitphx
  • How to Create a Timelapse of Satellite Imagery With Google Earth Engine and Streamlit @giswqs
  • Dimensionality reduction in Machine Learning using Singular Value Decomposition(SVD)Python|Streamlit @avratanubiswas
  • Understanding Streamlit/Python Application Flow
  • I tried building a AUTO MACHINE LEARNING Web App 15 Minutes
  • Streamlit in python | Part -10 | Tamil | Chart elements -2 | Deep Matrix | Data Science
  • Build Machine Learning Web Application Using Python (Streamlit)
  • Streamlit Crash Course (Arabic)
  • Interactive Dashboard with Streamlit, Pandas, and Plotly
  • 5 steps to build a Data Web App MVP with Python and Streamlit
  • Advance Streamlit Functions: Session State and Callback
  • Create your own customized avatar in Python
  • COVID-19 Mortality Triage with Streamlit, Pycaret, and Shap
  • Pixar Characters streamlit App
  • Streamlit Sidebar and Columns | Streamlit Tutorial [2022]
  • Data Analytics and Web Apps - 20 - Streamlit 1
  • Replit Demo // Modern Collaborative Browser-based IDE (Streamlit Example) | Demohub.dev
  • آشنایی و آموزش databutton - پلتفرم محبوب دوست داران streamlit - جلسه اول (معرفی و بررسی)
  • آموزش پروژه محور پایتون با Databutton - Streamlit - ساخت وبسایت اشتراک محور - جلسه دوم
  • Build a website using python & streamlit by- Uncle Official
  • Aplicaciones de Datos en Python con Streamlit - Presentación del Curso
  • Aplicaciones de Datos en Python con Streamlit - Demo Fifa 23
  • Using the kaggle tech jobs dataset deploy an ML tech job recommendation web app on Streamlit cloud
  • FastAPI + Streamlit + DocumentDB 구축으로 간이 고객 정보 입력 폼 만들기(1)
  • Say Hello to IVIS! Hassle-free, open source and fast Computer Vision app (Image Classification, Object Detection, Semantic Segmentation)
  • Database for Datascientist? Easy and quick solution with MongoDB and Pandas+Streamlit (Part 2)
  • Visualize Data with Streamlit and InfluxDB
  • やはりStreamlitは素晴らしかった。REACTはもう要らない・・・泣
  • Building an Infrastructure App with Resoto and Streamlit
  • 【Streamlit】グラフを動的に変化させて、ダッシュボードを作ろう【matplotlib】
  • 【Python】気象庁の降水量データを整形して、地図上にバーグラフを表示してみた【Streamlit】

NLP and Language

  • RE-VEU
  • Convert Roman Urdu to Urdu Script
  • Easy Edit
  • Search Videos/Audios Easily
  • Tweet prediction on Streamlit

Data Visualization

  • Apakah Kecenderungan Membaca Bergantung pada Penggunaan Media Sosial?
  • Avocado Interactive Sales Visualization with Streamlit
  • Impact of the 2022 OSTP Memo
  • Streamlit IFC

CV and Images

  • Singular Value Decomposition of an Image @avratanubiswas
  • OCR Comparator @loren
  • Image Enhancer
  • Image-Inpainting

Sports

  • Soccer Pelican Search
  • Copa do Mundo 2022

Finance and Business

  • Financial Ratio Visualizer
  • Stocks & Crypto ML prediction
  • Stock Price App
  • Airbnb Price Prediction App
  • Telco Churn App
  • Real Estate Dashboard
  • POUPAR NO IMI
  • Car Price Prediction App
  • Prevendo Faturamento
  • Business Analytics on the Blockchain - Episode 4
  • CLV Estimator in StreamLit App

Geography and Society

  • Guess the State! @gerardrbentley
  • RedHouse
  • Optimalisasi Pemanfaatan Energi Terbarukan Indonesia
  • Korelasi BOR dengan Jumlah Kematian Covid-19

General

  • Exploratory Data Analysis
  • Training SQLite
  • Anime Recommender System
  • Resume
  • 簡易文書検索システム
  • app-Pi
  • Python Competition | Python | AI & ML Projects | Website programmed using Streamlit and Python

Model building and training

  • AutoMLOps

Cool happenings and other things

  • New component: streamlit_scrollable_textbox! @RobertoFN
  • streamlit-analytics (update) @jrieke

Follow us

  • Twitter
